entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:09 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 02:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
